artist: Artist: Alex Katz; Publisher: Peter Blum Edition, New York
creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
description: black on cream paper; black lines with rough edges across lower half of image and black roughly V-shapes lines in lower right corner suggest lines of a field; black lines in V-shape connect to lines of white rectangles to suggest trees; black sky; white cloud- or bush-like shapes near middle of image on left side; paper has rough edges

title: Landscapes
